settings.title: Anxiety Treatment
settings.subtitle: Anxiety is characterised by physical and psychological symptoms due to a persistent fear and worry about situations in everyday life. Products that counter stress, and sleep disturbances can help improve mild anxiety.

settings.title: What are different types of Anxiety?
settings.text: Anxiety can be situational, performance-based or generalised. Depending on an individual basis, anxiety can be triggered in specific situations or without any triggers at all.

settings.title: How to treat Anxiety?
settings.text: Fortunately, anxiety can be treated with therapy, changes in lifestyle or prescribed medications that help relieve symptoms like chest pain, heart palpitations, and shortness of breath.

settings.title: Increase in Reported Anxiety and Depression
settings.text: The pandemic has triggered incidences of mental stress like anxiety and depression globally.

settings.title: Increase in Prescription Drugs
settings.text: More individuals received prescription drugs for anxiety and depression since the pandemic as compared to years before.

settings.title: Expert’s Opinion
settings.text: “Anxiety can be a normal and even healthy emotion. But it's one you might want to tame if it starts to get out of hand. Anxiety can give you sweaty palms, a racing heart, butterflies in your stomach, or make you feel like you're going to faint. It may make you feel out of control, tense, and irritable. For some people, anxiety can be paralyzing. But with treatment, most people can manage their anxiety and lead normal lives!”
settings.name: Dr Sameer Nakedar

settings.title: What are the causes of anxiety?
settings.text: Anxiety can be triggered by specific places, situations or traumatic events. It can be caused by a plethora of factors and may even be generalised.

settings.title: What are the medicines available to treat anxiety?
settings.text: The first line of treatment for anxiety is self-help, therapy or relaxation techniques. However, depending on the severity of the condition, Doctors may prescribe Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors (SSRI) or antidepressants.

settings.title: Is anxiety medication effective?
settings.text: The Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors will increase the levels of serotonin in your brain to ease the level of anxiety. Serotonin is a chemical or hormone produced as a regulator for mood, appetite, cognition, memory and various other functions.

settings.title: What are symptoms of anxiety?
settings.text:
The common symptoms of anxiety include:

1. Restlessness

2. Heart Palpitations

3. Shortness of Breath

4. Sweating/ Trembling

5. Fear of impending doom

The symptoms can vary depending on the individuals.

settings.title: What is an online consultation?
settings.text: An online consultation checks if you are eligible to purchase the product. Some products only require an online consultation which approximately takes 1 minute to complete, enabling you to buy the product. Other products will also require a prescription; in this case, you will need to complete the online consultation, and then one of our partner pharmacy prescribers or doctors will review the online consultation questions and approve the order for delivery if you are eligible to purchase the item.

settings.title: How is the medication packaged?
settings.text: All our medication is packaged in plain confidential padded white or brown envelopes. This ensures that your orders are discreet, and the content of the orders will be for your eyes only.

settings.title: When will my order be delivered?

settings.title: Can I return my order?
settings.text: For non-medicinal products, you are eligible to return the product within 14 days of receipt in the same packaging you received. For medicinal products, you are eligible to cancel the order only until it has been dispatched. From that point forward, you are no longer eligible to return the order.

settings.title: Can I cancel my order?
settings.text: You have the right to cancel your order for medication up to the point when your medication is dispatched.

settings.title: Is this medication suitable for me?
settings.text: Please get in touch with a doctor if you are unsure what medication is suitable for you. You can also complete our online consultation form to check your eligibility for the product.
